Eat is the perfect base for your online shop or to present your cafÃƒÂ©, restaurant or bar. It takes full advantage of UIkit components such as the beautiful switcher, that you can use to filter different content types, like varying product classes. Eat also features a bonus style for the Widgetkit Slideshow, perfectly fitting into the themeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s design.

Eat is based on Warp 7 and provides full support for LESS. The front-end is completely built with UIkit and can be modified through the Customizer. You can change colors, spacings and fonts without having to write a single line of code. To get you started, Eat already provides 8 different style variations to choose from.
